pdgrapher.pdgrapher module¶

class pdgrapher.pdgrapher.PDGrapher(edge_index: Tensor, *, model_kwargs: Dict[str, Any] = {}, response_kwargs: Dict[str, Any] = {}, perturbation_kwargs: Dict[str, Any] = {})¶

Bases: object

PDGrapher is a model that… It consists of two submodels: Response Prediction Model (RP) and Perturbation Discovery Model (PD).

forward(*args, **kwargs) → Any¶
get_optimizers_and_schedulers()¶

Returns all optimizers and learning rate schedulers.

Returns:

First element in the tuple is a 2-list of optimizers, at index 0 there are optimizers for the RP model and at index 1 for the PD model. Second element in the tuple is a 2-list of LR schedulers, at index 0 there are LR schedulers for optimizers, connected to the RP model, and at index 1 there are LR schedulers for optimizers, connected to the PD model.

Return type:

tuple[list[Optimizer | list[Optimizer]],list[None | LRScheduler | list[LRScheduler]]]

set_optimizers_and_schedulers(optimizers: List[Optimizer | List[Optimizer]], schedulers=[None, None]) → None¶

_summary_

Parameters:

  • optimizers (list[Optimizer, list[Optimizer]]) – _description_

  • schedulers (list[None, LRScheduler, list[LRScheduler]], optional) – _description_. Defaults to [None, None].
